title: The Phantom
description:
We want to thank you for your support. As a small studio, working on a beloved and historic character like the Phantom has been both an honor and a privilege. We’ve poured our hearts into making the Phantom look as good in the game as he does in the comics . While the game is out now, our work on The Phantom hasn’t stopped. We’re hard at work and have a big patch on the way that addresses the community’s feedback.
Thank you so much for being a part of this journey . For more info on what’s coming, see the discussion boards. Comics’ very first costumed hero has arrived on Steam with only his physical strength , skill with weapons and fearsome reputation to fight crime Command & Conquer Remastered Collection
The Phantom is an arcade -style beat-em-up coming to PC and consoles. Play as The Phantom or his partner, Diana Palmer, in this 14-level adventure. The feared pirates of the Singh Brotherhood are battling for power and threatening The Phantom’s legacy, and it’s up to you to stop them. Use your hand-to-hand fighting skills and trusty weapons to dispatch this evil, and call in assistance from your animal friends Fraka the falcon and Devil the wolf.
The Phantom features a brand-new story approved by King Features. Experience this canon addition through full-screen cut scenes and captivating in-game visuals, hand-illustrated and animated frame-by-frame by seasoned comic book artists and Art Of Play’s dedicated in-house 2D creative team.
